module.name: FileInfo
module.short: File and program version information utilities

descr.p: The FileInfo unit provides classes and utilities for extracting and manipulating version information from executable files and modules. It includes both low-level access through TVersionInfo and high-level component-based access through TFileVersionInfo.

The unit also provides convenience functions for version comparison (CompareVersionQuads, CompareProgramVersion, NewerVersion), string conversion (VersionQuadToStr, ProgramversionToStr, StrToVersionQuad, StrToProgramVersion), and version extraction (GetProgramVersion).

element.name: SysUtils
element.short: String formatting

element.name: Classes
element.short: Streams

element.name: resource
element.short: Getting resources

element.name: versiontypes
element.short: various resource types

element.name: versionresource
element.short: Version resourceM

element.name: TVersionInfo
element.short: Low-level class for accessing version information from executable files

descr.p: TVersionInfo provides direct access to version resources in executable files. It can load version information from files or module instances and exposes the raw version data structures.

errors.p: Raises EVersionInfo when attempting to access version information before loading any resources.

element.name: TVersionInfo.Create
element.short: Creates a new TVersionInfo instance

descr.p: Initializes the TVersionInfo object. No version information is loaded until Load is called.

element.name: TVersionInfo.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the TVersionInfo instance and frees resources

descr.p: Frees all loaded version resources and destroys the object.

element.name: TVersionInfo.Load
element.short: Loads version information from a file or module instance

descr.p: Load extracts version resources from the specified source. It can load from a file name or from a module instance handle. After successful loading, version information is available through the properties.

errors.p: May raise exceptions if the file cannot be opened or contains invalid version resources.

element.name: TVersionInfo.Load.Instance
element.short: Module instance handle to load version information from

element.name: TVersionInfo.Load.AFileName
element.short: File name to load version information from

element.name: TVersionInfo.FixedInfo
element.short: Fixed version information structure

descr.p: Provides access to the fixed version information containing file version, product version, file flags, and other binary version data.

element.name: TVersionInfo.StringFileInfo
element.short: String-based version information

descr.p: Provides access to string version information such as company name, file description, file version, and other textual version data. Information is organized by language and code page.

element.name: TVersionInfo.VarFileInfo
element.short: Variable version information containing language and code page data

descr.p: Provides access to the variable file information containing supported languages and code pages for the version strings.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo
element.short: High-level component for accessing file version information

descr.p: TFileVersionInfo is a component that provides easy access to version information from executable files. It automatically extracts version strings and supports filtering by key names and translations. The component can be enabled to automatically read version information when properties change.

errors.p: Raises EVersionInfo when translation is not found and TranslationOnly is True.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.Create
element.short: Creates a new TFileVersionInfo component

descr.p: Initializes the component with empty string lists for version strings and filter.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.Create.AOwner
element.short: Owner component for the version info instance

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the TFileVersionInfo component

descr.p: Frees the internal string lists and destroys the component.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.Loaded
element.short: Called after component loading is complete

descr.p: Automatically triggers version information reading if the component is enabled after being loaded from a stream.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.ReadFileInfo
element.short: Reads version information from the specified file

descr.p: ReadFileInfo extracts version strings from the file specified by FileName. If no file is specified, it reads from the current executable. The extracted strings are filtered according to Filter and stored in VersionStrings.

errors.p: Raises EVersionInfo if the specified translation is not found and TranslationOnly is True.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.Enabled
element.short: Controls automatic reading of version information

descr.p: When True, version information is automatically read when properties change. When False, ReadFileInfo must be called manually.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.FileName
element.short: File name to read version information from

descr.p: Specifies the executable file to extract version information from. If empty, version information is read from the current executable.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.VersionStrings
element.short: Extracted version information strings

descr.p: Contains the version strings extracted from the file in key=value format. The strings are filtered according to Filter settings.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.Filter
element.short: List of version string keys to extract

descr.p: Contains the names of version string keys to extract. If empty, all available version strings are extracted. Common keys include CompanyName, FileDescription, FileVersion, ProductName, ProductVersion.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.Translation
element.short: Language and code page identifier for version strings

descr.p: Specifies which language and code page combination to use when extracting version strings. The format is an 8-character hexadecimal string (e.g., "040904b0" for English US). If empty, the first available translation is used.

element.name: TFileVersionInfo.TranslationOnly
element.short: Controls behavior when specified translation is not found

descr.p: When True, an exception is raised if the specified Translation is not found. When False, the first available translation is used instead.

element.name: EVersionInfo
element.short: Exception class for version information errors

descr.p: EVersionInfo is raised when errors occur during version information processing, such as accessing unloaded resources or missing translations.

element.name: TVersionQuad
element.short: Array type for storing four-part version numbers

descr.p: TVersionQuad is an array of four Word values representing major, minor, revision, and build numbers respectively.

element.name: TProgramVersion
element.short: Record type for storing four-part version numbers

descr.p: TProgramVersion is a record with named fields for major, minor, revision, and build numbers. It provides a more readable alternative to TVersionQuad.

element.name: TProgramVersion.Major
element.short: Major version number

element.name: TProgramVersion.Minor
element.short: Minor version number

element.name: TProgramVersion.Revision
element.short: Revision version number

element.name: TProgramVersion.Build
element.short: Build version number

element.name: TVersionCompare
element.short: Result of version comparison operations

descr.p: TVersionCompare indicates the level of difference between two version numbers, from equal to major version differences.

element.name: TVersionCompare.vcEqual
element.short: Versions are identical

element.name: TVersionCompare.vcBuildDiffers
element.short: Only build numbers differ

element.name: TVersionCompare.vcRevisionDiffers
element.short: Revision numbers or lower differ

element.name: TVersionCompare.vcMinorDiffers
element.short: Minor version numbers or lower differ

element.name: TVersionCompare.vcMajorDiffers
element.short: Major version numbers differ

element.name: GetProgramVersion
element.short: Extracts version information from the current executable

descr.p: GetProgramVersion retrieves the file version from the current executable's version resources. Returns True if version information was successfully extracted, False otherwise.

element.name: GetProgramVersion.Result
element.short: Returns True if version information was successfully extracted

element.name: GetProgramVersion.Version
element.short: Variable to receive the extracted version information

element.name: CompareVersionQuads
element.short: Compares two version quad arrays

descr.p: CompareVersionQuads compares two TVersionQuad values and returns the level of difference between them. Comparison is performed hierarchically from major to build version.

element.name: CompareVersionQuads.Result
element.short: Level of difference between the two version quads

element.name: CompareVersionQuads.Quad1
element.short: First version quad to compare

element.name: CompareVersionQuads.Quad2
element.short: Second version quad to compare

element.name: CompareProgramVersion
element.short: Compares two program version records

descr.p: CompareProgramVersion compares two TProgramVersion records and returns the level of difference between them.

element.name: CompareProgramVersion.Result
element.short: Level of difference between the two program versions

element.name: CompareProgramVersion.Version1
element.short: First program version to compare

element.name: CompareProgramVersion.Version2
element.short: Second program version to compare

element.name: VersionQuadToStr
element.short: Converts a version quad to string representation

descr.p: VersionQuadToStr converts a TVersionQuad to a string in the format "major.minor.revision.build".

element.name: VersionQuadToStr.Result
element.short: String representation of the version quad

element.name: VersionQuadToStr.Quad
element.short: Version quad to convert to string

element.name: ProgramversionToStr
element.short: Converts a program version record to string representation

descr.p: ProgramversionToStr converts a TProgramVersion to a string in the format "major.minor.revision.build".

element.name: ProgramversionToStr.Result
element.short: String representation of the program version

element.name: ProgramversionToStr.Version
element.short: Program version to convert to string

element.name: TryStrToVersionQuad
element.short: Attempts to convert a string to a version quad

descr.p: TryStrToVersionQuad parses a version string and converts it to a TVersionQuad. Returns True if the conversion was successful, False otherwise. Accepts strings in the format "major.minor.revision.build".

element.name: TryStrToVersionQuad.Result
element.short: Returns True if the string was successfully parsed

element.name: TryStrToVersionQuad.S
element.short: String to parse as version quad

element.name: TryStrToVersionQuad.Quad
element.short: Variable to receive the parsed version quad

element.name: TryStrToProgramVersion
element.short: Attempts to convert a string to a program version record

descr.p: TryStrToProgramVersion parses a version string and converts it to a TProgramVersion. Returns True if the conversion was successful, False otherwise.

element.name: TryStrToProgramVersion.Result
element.short: Returns True if the string was successfully parsed

element.name: TryStrToProgramVersion.S
element.short: String to parse as program version

element.name: TryStrToProgramVersion.Version
element.short: Variable to receive the parsed program version

element.name: StrToVersionQuad
element.short: Converts a string to a version quad

descr.p: StrToVersionQuad parses a version string and converts it to a TVersionQuad. Raises an exception if the string cannot be parsed.

errors.p: Raises EConvertError if the string is not a valid version quad format.

element.name: StrToVersionQuad.Result
element.short: Parsed version quad

element.name: StrToVersionQuad.S
element.short: String to parse as version quad

element.name: StrToProgramVersion
element.short: Converts a string to a program version record

descr.p: StrToProgramVersion parses a version string and converts it to a TProgramVersion. Raises an exception if the string cannot be parsed.

errors.p: Raises EConvertError if the string is not a valid version format.

element.name: StrToProgramVersion.Result
element.short: Parsed program version

element.name: StrToProgramVersion.S
element.short: String to parse as program version

element.name: NewerVersion
element.short: Determines if one version is newer than another

descr.p: NewerVersion compares two version values and returns True if the first version is newer than the second. Supports TVersionQuad, TProgramVersion, and string parameters.

element.name: NewerVersion.Result
element.short: Returns True if the first version is newer

element.name: NewerVersion.Q1
element.short: First version quad to compare

element.name: NewerVersion.Q2
element.short: Second version quad to compare

element.name: NewerVersion.V1
element.short: First version to compare

element.name: NewerVersion.V2
element.short: Second version to compare

element.name: assign(TVersionQuad):TProgramVersion
element.short: Assignment operator from version quad to program version

descr.p: This operator allows assigning a TVersionQuad to a TProgramVersion variable.

element.name: assign(TVersionQuad):TProgramVersion.Result
element.short: Resulting program version

element.name: assign(TVersionQuad):TProgramVersion.q
element.short: Version quad to convert

element.name: assign(TProgramVersion):TVersionQuad
element.short: Assignment operator from program version to version quad

descr.p: This operator allows assigning a TProgramVersion to a TVersionQuad variable.

element.name: assign(TProgramVersion):TVersionQuad.Result
element.short: Resulting version quad

element.name: assign(TProgramVersion):TVersionQuad.V
element.short: Program version to convert
